page.title: 08GLENN'S AFTERNOON
page.content: {GLENN'S DAY CONTINUES At home I had beefburgers and chips which I quickly ate before returning to school.I played football until it was time for afternoon school. I read quietly for fifteen minutes then class went out for games.We had the choice of football or rounders. Games lasted nearly an hour.We went in for our teacher to read us a story.A few minutes to tidy the class then it was 3.15 hometime. I raced home, took off my coat and shoes and was soon out to play again. Mom called me in for tea. I ate tea, then played on my computer until it was time for Scouts. I put on my scout uniform then went back to school for 8.00.Scouts included flagbreak, non- stop cricket, a camp talk, prayers, then flagdown at 9.30. home quickly then a drink and bed for 10.30.
